trans-unit.source: Using Azure AD Connect Health with sync | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Using Azure AD Connect Health with sync | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: This is the Azure AD Connect Health page that will discuss how to monitor Azure AD Connect sync.
trans-unit.target: This is the Azure AD Connect Health page that will discuss how to monitor Azure AD Connect sync.

trans-unit.source: Using Azure AD Connect Health for sync
trans-unit.target: Using Azure AD Connect Health for sync

trans-unit.source: The following documentation is specific to monitoring Azure AD Connect sync with Azure AD Connect Health.
trans-unit.target: The following documentation is specific to monitoring Azure AD Connect sync with Azure AD Connect Health.

trans-unit.source: For information on monitoring AD FS with Azure AD Connect Health see [Using Azure AD Connect Health with AD FS](active-directory-aadconnect-health-adfs.md).
trans-unit.target: For information on monitoring AD FS with Azure AD Connect Health see [Using Azure AD Connect Health with AD FS](active-directory-aadconnect-health-adfs.md).

trans-unit.source: Azure AD Connect Health for Sync
trans-unit.target: Azure AD Connect Health for Sync

trans-unit.source: Alerts for Azure AD Connect Health for sync
trans-unit.target: Alerts for Azure AD Connect Health for sync

trans-unit.source: The Azure AD Connect Health Alerts for sync section provides you the list of active alerts.
trans-unit.target: The Azure AD Connect Health Alerts for sync section provides you the list of active alerts.

trans-unit.source: Each alert includes relevant information, resolution steps, and links to related documentation.
trans-unit.target: Each alert includes relevant information, resolution steps, and links to related documentation.

trans-unit.source: By selecting an active or resolved alert you will see a new blade with additional information, as well as steps you can take to resolve the alert, and links to additional documentation.
trans-unit.target: By selecting an active or resolved alert you will see a new blade with additional information, as well as steps you can take to resolve the alert, and links to additional documentation.

trans-unit.source: You can also view historical data on alerts that were resolved in the past.
trans-unit.target: You can also view historical data on alerts that were resolved in the past.

trans-unit.source: By selecting an alert you will be provided with additional information as well as steps you can take to resolve the alert and links to additional documentation.
trans-unit.target: By selecting an alert you will be provided with additional information as well as steps you can take to resolve the alert and links to additional documentation.

trans-unit.source: Azure AD Connect sync error
trans-unit.target: Azure AD Connect sync error

trans-unit.source: Sync Insight
trans-unit.target: Sync Insight

trans-unit.source: With the latest release of Azure AD Connect Health for sync the following new capabilities have been added:
trans-unit.target: With the latest release of Azure AD Connect Health for sync the following new capabilities have been added:

trans-unit.source: Latency of sync operations
trans-unit.target: Latency of sync operations

trans-unit.source: Object Change trend
trans-unit.target: Object Change trend

trans-unit.source: Sync Latency
trans-unit.target: Sync Latency

trans-unit.source: This feature provides a graphical trend of latency of the sync operations (import, export, etc.) for connectors.
trans-unit.target: This feature provides a graphical trend of latency of the sync operations (import, export, etc.) for connectors.

trans-unit.source: This provides a quick and easy way to understand not only the latency of your operations (great if you have a large set of changes occurring) but also a way to detect anomalies in the latency that may require further investigation.
trans-unit.target: This provides a quick and easy way to understand not only the latency of your operations (great if you have a large set of changes occurring) but also a way to detect anomalies in the latency that may require further investigation.

trans-unit.source: Sync Latency
trans-unit.target: Sync Latency

trans-unit.source: By default, only the latency of the 'Export' operation for the Azure AD connector is shown.
trans-unit.target: By default, only the latency of the 'Export' operation for the Azure AD connector is shown.

trans-unit.source: To see more operations on the connector or to view operations from other connectors, right-click on the chart and choose the specific operation and connector.
trans-unit.target: To see more operations on the connector or to view operations from other connectors, right-click on the chart and choose the specific operation and connector.

trans-unit.source: Sync Object Changes
trans-unit.target: Sync Object Changes

trans-unit.source: This feature provides a graphical trend of the number of changes that are being evaluated and exported to Azure AD.
trans-unit.target: This feature provides a graphical trend of the number of changes that are being evaluated and exported to Azure AD.

trans-unit.source: Today, trying to gather this information from the sync logs is difficult.
trans-unit.target: Today, trying to gather this information from the sync logs is difficult.

trans-unit.source: The chart gives you, not only a simpler way of monitoring the number of changes that are occurring in your environment, but also a visual view of the failures that are occurring.
trans-unit.target: The chart gives you, not only a simpler way of monitoring the number of changes that are occurring in your environment, but also a visual view of the failures that are occurring.
